channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Astra Pro Addon

item.title: CVE-2021-24507|2024-08-03T19:35:20.199Z -- unknown -- astra%20pro%20addon
item.description: The Astra Pro Addon WordPress plugin before 3.5.2 did not properly sanitise or escape some of the POST parameters from the astra_pagination_infinite and astra_shop_pagination_infinite AJAX action (available to both unauthenticated and authenticated user) before using them in SQL statement, leading to an SQL Injection issues
